name: Paws and Potions
description:
Kitty's in a rush! Brew a luck potion by reading the recipe, gathering ingredients, and refining them at the various stations. Controls: WASD to move, too many more to name as per the theme :D
Made for the Beaver Welcome Week Game Jam 2022! Theme: Too Many Controls KNOWN BUGS (will be updated after jam!): Win screen will transition to lose screen when time runs out.

Programming & Game Design by me (https://austinwebber.me/).

All art by Ezraelle C. Lochner! (https://ezraellelochner.wixsite.com/portfolio)

Music and sound effects either owned by me or royalty-free :)
